verses.verse: The word <S%H1697><s%> that <S%H834><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Jeremiah <S%H3414><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H854><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and speak <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and to <S%H5921><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%>

And say <S%H559><s%> thou unto <S%H413><s%> them, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of Israel; <S%H3478><s%> Cursed <S%H779><s%> be the man <S%H376><s%> that <S%H834><s%> obeyeth <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H853><s%> your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought them forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from the iron <S%H1270><s%> furnace, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3564><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice, <S%H6963><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them, according to all <S%H3605><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I command <S%H6680><s%> you: so shall ye be <S%H1961><s%> my people, <S%H5971><s%> and I <S%H595><s%> will be <S%H1961><s%> your God: <S%H430><s%>

That <S%H4616><s%> I may perform <S%H6965><s%> <S%H853><s%> the oath <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> unto your fathers, <S%H1><s%> to give <S%H5414><s%> them a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey, <S%H1706><s%> as it is this <S%H2088><s%> day. <S%H3117><s%> Then answered <S%H6030><s%> I, and said, <S%H559><s%> So be it, <S%H543><s%> O LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, Proclaim <S%H7121><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and in the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Hear <S%H8085><s%> ye <S%H853><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> them.

For <S%H3588><s%> I earnestly protested <S%H5749><s%> <S%H5749><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> that I brought them up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H853><s%> out of the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> rising early <S%H7925><s%> and protesting, <S%H5749><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Obey <S%H8085><s%> my voice. <S%H6963><s%>

Yet they obeyed <S%H8085><s%> not, <S%H3808><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> inclined <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> their ear, <S%H241><s%> but walked <S%H1980><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> in the imagination <S%H8307><s%> of their evil <S%H7451><s%> heart: <S%H3820><s%> therefore I will bring <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> of this <S%H2063><s%> covenant, <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> them to do; <S%H6213><s%> but they did <S%H6213><s%> them not. <S%H3808><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, A conspiracy <S%H7195><s%> is found <S%H4672><s%> among the men <S%H376><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and among the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem. <S%H3389><s%>

They are turned back <S%H7725><s%> to <S%H5921><s%> the iniquities <S%H5771><s%> of their forefathers, <S%H7223><s%> <S%H1><s%> which <S%H834><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> my words; <S%H1697><s%> and they <S%H1992><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> to serve <S%H5647><s%> them: the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> have broken <S%H6565><s%> <S%H853><s%> my covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I made <S%H3772><s%> with <S%H854><s%> their fathers. <S%H1><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> them, which <S%H834><s%> they shall not <S%H3808><s%> be able <S%H3201><s%> to escape; <S%H3318><s%> <S%H4480><s%> and though they shall cry <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, I will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken <S%H8085><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them.

Then shall the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> go, <S%H1980><s%> and cry <S%H2199><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the gods <S%H430><s%> unto whom <S%H834><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> offer incense: <S%H6999><s%> but they shall not <S%H3808><s%> save them at all <S%H3467><s%> <S%H3467><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of their trouble. <S%H7451><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of thy cities <S%H5892><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> thy gods, <S%H430><s%> O Judah; <S%H3063><s%> and according to the number <S%H4557><s%> of the streets <S%H2351><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> have ye set up <S%H7760><s%> altars <S%H4196><s%> to that shameful thing, <S%H1322><s%> even altars <S%H4196><s%> to burn incense <S%H6999><s%> unto Baal. <S%H1168><s%>

Therefore pray <S%H6419><s%> not <S%H408><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> neither <S%H408><s%> lift up <S%H5375><s%> a cry <S%H7440><s%> or prayer <S%H8605><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will not <S%H369><s%> hear <S%H8085><s%> them in the time <S%H6256><s%> that they cry <S%H7121><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me for <S%H1157><s%> their trouble. <S%H7451><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> hath my beloved <S%H3039><s%> to do in mine house, <S%H1004><s%> seeing she hath wrought <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H4209><s%> with many, <S%H7227><s%> and the holy <S%H6944><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> is passed <S%H5674><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> thee? when <S%H3588><s%> thou doest evil, <S%H7451><s%> then <S%H227><s%> thou rejoicest. <S%H5937><s%>

The LORD <S%H3068><s%> called <S%H7121><s%> thy name, <S%H8034><s%> A green <S%H7488><s%> olive tree, <S%H2132><s%> fair, <S%H3303><s%> and of goodly <S%H8389><s%> fruit: <S%H6529><s%> with the noise <S%H6963><s%> of a great <S%H1419><s%> tumult <S%H1999><s%> he hath kindled <S%H3341><s%> fire <S%H784><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> it, and the branches <S%H1808><s%> of it are broken. <S%H7489><s%>

For the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that planted <S%H5193><s%> thee, hath pronounced <S%H1696><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, for <S%H1588><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they have done <S%H6213><s%> against themselves to provoke me to anger <S%H3707><s%> in offering incense <S%H6999><s%> unto Baal. <S%H1168><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath given me knowledge <S%H3045><s%> of it, and I know <S%H3045><s%> it: then <S%H227><s%> thou showedst <S%H7200><s%> me their doings. <S%H4611><s%>

But I <S%H589><s%> was like a lamb <S%H3532><s%> or an ox <S%H441><s%> that is brought <S%H2986><s%> to the slaughter; <S%H2873><s%> and I knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> they had devised <S%H2803><s%> devices <S%H4284><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> me, saying, Let us destroy <S%H7843><s%> the tree <S%H6086><s%> with the fruit <S%H3899><s%> thereof, and let us cut him off <S%H3772><s%> from the land <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> of the living, <S%H2416><s%> that his name <S%H8034><s%> may be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> remembered. <S%H2142><s%>

But, O LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> that judgest <S%H8199><s%> righteously, <S%H6664><s%> that triest <S%H974><s%> the reins <S%H3629><s%> and the heart, <S%H3820><s%> let me see <S%H7200><s%> thy vengeance <S%H5360><s%> on <S%H4480><s%> them: for <S%H3588><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee have I revealed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H853><s%> my cause. <S%H7379><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of <S%H5921><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy life, <S%H5315><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Prophesy <S%H5012><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> in the name <S%H8034><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> that thou die <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> by our hand: <S%H3027><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will punish <S%H6485><s%> <S%H5921><s%> them: the young men <S%H970><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> their sons <S%H1121><s%> and their daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall die <S%H4191><s%> by famine: <S%H7458><s%>

And there shall be <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> remnant <S%H7611><s%> of them: for <S%H3588><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> even the year <S%H8141><s%> of their visitation. <S%H6486><s%>
